attributes.action: allow udhiya/qurbani by muslim members of the public
attributes.additional_details: allow muslims to slaughter their own animal on eid ul adha and practice this act of worship to to their lord, which is obligatory for all muslims. Allow them to practice their own religion how it is meant to be practiced (the slaughter is meant to be made by the muslim himself) with no doubts as they bought the animal , took the animal to the slaughterhouse, and sacrificed it themselves for the pleasure of their lord. The slaughter should be done in a slaughterhouse by the muslims themselves , brief verbal training and aid should be given by any worker from the slaughterhouse by law,the throat should be cut by the one whose animal it is, they should then have their sheep cut up and skinned and be able to take the produce home . please sign this petition , muslim or not , please help us to be able to practice our religion freely...
